void Predator::setBehaviorState ( const BehaviorState &  state  )  [virtual]

Thismethod changes the current behavioral state of the Predator.

This method also notifies the PredatorManager if an actual state change occurs.

Parameters:
state The BehaviorState to set the Predator to, what the new State actually does depends on the PredatorBehaviorFmily in use.
